channel.title: Eldevin: F2P MMORPG - Closed beta - Browser based - Free beta keys
channel.description:
This is a game i've discovered thanks to a few friends. It's a Java, browser based F2P MMORPG. I'm in the game now and it's very fun and the controls are pretty simple. I recommend you at least check it out, you'll either love it or hate it. Does RS have competition? Eldevin looks pretty promising to me. I'm doing the tutorial now, however there's a lot of maintenance at the moment. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iFvBvtO6OR4 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PR2Rxb24lPE Screenshots: http://www.mmorpg.com/gamelist.cfm/game/857/feature/7258/First-Steps-Into-the-Indie-MMO.html/page/1 [img]http://i.imgur.com/E1LAbgF.jpg[/img] How to get a beta key:
1. Go to http://www.freemmorpglist.com/mmorpg-news-we-are-celebrating-a-phase-2-closed-beta-key-giveaway-for-eldevin.html 2. Scroll down on the page and enter your e-mail. 3. Grab your key.
How to play:
Create an account at https://www.huntedcow.com/account and select Eldevin next to Beta Opt-In, enter your key and begin playing.

item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Quests are really good for exp. While they are all really short, and basic, they are great for exp and all optional.

All the quests are is kill this or fish this and give me this.

I hate these games that try to look realistic but fail miserably

but why judge the entire game based on its graphics?
[/quote]some art styles just don’t appeal to me at all and I wouldn’t want to bother playing them, and this is that type[/quote]
i didn’t think i would like this game, so i avoided it. when i finally tried it i loved it

item.title: Eldevin: F2P MMORPG - Closed beta - Browser based - Free beta keys
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Newty:

I expect a silab client in 10 days or less

vQaZtOE.jpg1280×1024

loader decompiled

Newty:

I expect a silab client in 10 days or less

vQaZtOE.jpg1280×1024

loader decompiled

by the way here is the GBClient: http://uppit.com/vowiaxltipu6/EldevinClient.zip

            String var4 = "747DA8F0024ABFE26AA49B6C3285CC47";
            byte[] var3 = DatatypeConverter.parseHexBinary("747DA8F0024ABFE26AA49B6C3285CC47");
            var2.f(var3);
            var4 = "CB13370FDC5197B54FA4D269D5A80ACD";
            byte[] var16 = DatatypeConverter.parseHexBinary("CB13370FDC5197B54FA4D269D5A80ACD");
            var2.f(var16);
            Cipher var11;
            (var11 = Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding")).init(2, new SecretKeySpec(var16, "AES"), new IvParameterSpec(var3));
            arg0 = var11.doFinal(arg0);
            ByteArrayOutputStream var12 = new ByteArrayOutputStream(arg0.length);
            JarOutputStream var14 = new JarOutputStream(var12);
            Pack200.newUnpacker().unpack(new GZIPInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(arg0)), var14);
            var14.close();
//dump client
            FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream("Client.jar");
            out.write(var12.toByteArray());
            out.close();
//end dump client

item.title: Eldevin: F2P MMORPG - Closed beta - Browser based - Free beta keys
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

This is a game i’ve discovered thanks to a few friends. It’s a Java, browser based F2P MMORPG. I’m in the game now and it’s very fun and the controls are pretty simple. I recommend you at least check it out, you’ll either love it or hate it.

Does RS have competition? Eldevin looks pretty promising to me. I’m doing the tutorial now, however there’s a lot of maintenance at the moment.


Screenshots: http://www.mmorpg.com/gamelist.cfm/game/857/feature/7258/First-Steps-Into-the-Indie-MMO.html/page/1

E1LAbgF.jpg906×642

How to get a beta key:

1. Go to http://www.freemmorpglist.com/mmorpg-news-we-are-celebrating-a-phase-2-closed-beta-key-giveaway-for-eldevin.html 2. Scroll down on the page and enter your e-mail. 3. Grab your key.

How to play:

Create an account at https://www.huntedcow.com/account and select Eldevin next to Beta Opt-In, enter your key and begin playing.
